name: WGJ-2: Escape From The Taco Factory
name_original: WGJ-2: Escape From The Taco Factory
description:
Escape From the Taco Factory
This week's game was primarily inspired by a prompt on "Drawful 2" and ostriches. Most of the week was spent learning to model and animate the protagonist of the game, which was fun but left me with little energy to make a fun game of it.

Play in fullscreen for best results!

Controls:
Walk: WASD
Look: Mouse
Sprint: Left Shift
Jump: Space

WGJ-2: Weekly Game Jam

I have decided to make 1 game every week.

When I have made some really bad games then I can go on to try to make a good game, join me on that Journey!
